briefTitle: De Novo Sirolimus-based Immunosuppression After Liver Transplantation for Hepatocellular Carcinoma
officialTitle: De Novo Sirolimus-based Immunosuppression After Liver Transplantation for Hepatocellular Carcinoma: Long-Term Outcomes and Side Effects
summary: This study investigates whether sirolimus could decrease the rate of hepatoma recurrence after liver transplantation in high risk hepatoma patients.
